title: AT&T’s 3G network shuts down this week; here’s what you need to know
content:
Last year, AT&T announced that it would be shutting down its 3G network in February of 2022, impacting a range of users across consumer and enterprise groups. That shutdown is set to occur tomorrow, February 22, 2022, and we have the full details on what to expect below.

more…

The post AT&T’s 3G network shuts down this week; here’s what you need to know appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: AT&T is shutting down its 3G network in the US this week, impacting a range of products and devices. Here are the full details.
